prompt_inputs.goal: marathon training with morning long run

solution_criteria: Includes high carbohydrate meals throughout the day
Contains pre-run meal/snack timed before morning training
Includes post-run recovery meal with carbs and protein
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a marathon runner who requires high carbohydrate intake and specific timing around morning training sessions

prompt_inputs.goal: cutting phase while maintaining muscle mass

solution_criteria: Meal plan fits within one day
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a powerlifter in a cutting phase who needs high protein, moderate fat, and restricted calories while maintaining muscle mass

prompt_inputs.goal: maintain energy for twice-daily swim training

solution_criteria: Includes breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks
Provides adequate fuel before both morning and evening training sessions
Contains no nuts or nut-based ingredients
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a teenage swimmer with nut allergies who trains twice daily and needs adequate fuel for both morning and evening sessions
